T02D3116:215b-1: a'arya aushn'i sha si t'a ta pa tre sto tra /
T02D3116:215b-3: 'phags ma gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo la bstod pa /
T02D3116:215b-4: 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3116:215b-5: srid gsum ston pa mi dang lha yi lha //
T02D3116:215b-6: mtshungs med bde gshegs sh'akya seng ge yi //
T02D3116:215b-7: mthon mthing g-yas su 'khyil ba'i spyi gtsug nas //
T02D3116:215b-8: ya mtshan rmad byung lha mo khro rgyal gtso //
T02D3116:215b-9: khams gsum dag na khyod 'dra'i mgon med de //
T02D3116:215b-10: thugs rje'i dbang phyug bkra shis mchog gi lha //
T02D3116:215b-11: sku mdog gangs ri'i rtse la nyi shar 'dra //
T02D3116:215b-12: zhal mang stong la sbyan mang bye bas brgyan //
T02D3116:215b-13: srid pa'i btson rar sems can nyam thag pa'i //
T02D3116:215b-14: sdug bsngal gzigs nas sems can nyam thag la //
T02D3116:215b-15: zhal stong phyag stong spyan ni stong rnams kyis //
T02D3116:215b-16: kun la khyab mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3116:215b-17: bdud dang bgegs rigs phas kyi rgol ba rnams //
T02D3116:215b-18: spyan mnga' gcig gis khro gnyer 'ga' ston pas //
T02D3116:215b-19: gnod ba'i rgyun rnams gtan nas 'joms mdzad pa //
T02D3116:215b-20: rgol ba tshar gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3116:215b-21: ma rig nor bas bslus pa'i sems can rnams //
T02D3116:215b-22: rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa yis //
T02D3116:215b-23: 'du ba rnams bzhi'i rims nad mi bzad pa //
T02D3116:215b-24: zhi mdzad thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3116:215b-25: ji ltar khyod kyis sems can mang po la //
T02D3116:215b-26: thugs rje mchog gis 'gro don nyer bzung nas //
T02D3116:215b-27: srid gsum 'jigs ba che las bsgral gyur cing //
T02D3116:216a-1: bsngal mang po'i nad las thar mdzad ltar //
T02D3116:216a-2: bdag kyang khyod bzhin 'gro ba'i mgon gyur te //
T02D3116:216a-3: sems can klu yi zhags pas zin pa dang //
T02D3116:216a-4: nad kyi bskal pas nyen pa'i sems can la //
T02D3116:216a-5: sdug bsngal sel ba'i skyabs su bdag gyur cig /'phags pa gdugs dkar can la bstod pa /
